overview: Stacked with an ensemble cast (including over fifty extras), this drama follows seven emotions put to seven different interweaving stories. Each scene depicts strong feelings that lead to great sex. Paul Thomas presents Emotions, a Vivid production that features seven anals, squirting, multiple facials and two double penetration scenes. With that kind of action, you'll second that emotion.
tagline: Seven stories. Seven emotions. One common thread.
title: Emotions
